function.name: matches
function.description: Returns true if the string value matches pattern specified by regex.Optionally a timeout can be provided in seconds, the default value is 5 seconds. This should only be altered when dealing with large source documents. The timeout is there to protect the system from hanging on invalid expressions.See the Regular Expressions page for more about Regular Expression support in Xillio Content Tools.
